item.title: General Go Questions
item.description:
Questions? #

  1. What are Go interfaces, and why are they important?
  2. What is a goroutine, and how does it differ from a thread?
  3. Explain the concept of channels in Go. When and why would you use them?
  4. What is the difference between buffered and unbuffered channels?
  5. What is the iota keyword, and how is it used in Go?

item.title: Concurrency and Performance
item.description:
Questions? #

  1. How do you debug concurrent code in Go? For example, where to place wg.Add or when to close a channel?
  2. How would you optimize a web server written in Golang for high performance?
  3. What tools do you use for profiling Golang applications (e.g., pprof)? Explain their usage.
  4. How do goroutines and channels help in leveraging multi-core systems? Provide practical examples.
